name: Blessings
description: What the rituals will give you

pages.title: Ritual Items
pages.text:
\
\
The following pages will guide you through the items can be obtained from the runic ritual.\
\
Each require a sacrifice but will the power you obtain be worth it?

\
\
The **Athame** is a fast and deadly weapon and you will need to use the Diamond Ritual to obtain its power
pages.title: Athame

pages.text:
\
\
The **Chalice** works like a bottomless milk bucket curing you whenever you require. The Lapis Lazuli Ritual will grant you this boon
pages.title: Chalice

pages.text:
\
\
The **Coille Slat** grants growth to plants and can be obtained by using the Emerald Ritual
pages.title: Wand

pages.text:
\
\
An inexhaustable barrage of snowballs can be obtained by performing the Quartz Ritual
pages.title: Eternal Snowball

pages.text:
\
\
The **Wican Ward** will be granted to you if you complete the Amethyst Ritual and will stop mobs from spawning in your area
pages.title: Wican Ward

pages.text:
\
\
Using the Cinnabar Ritual you can obtain the incredibly powerful **Pentacle**. Whatever mob is sacrificed to obtain it will result in the Pentacle spawing that mob for eternity
pages.title: Pentacle
